title: AI for Classroom Management: Using AI to assist with classroom management, such as monitoring student engagement, automating attendance, or flagging disruptions.
author: Yaxuan

conceptCard.title: AI for Classroom Management: Using AI to assist with classroom management, such as monitoring student engagement, automating attendance, or flagging disruptions.
conceptCard.description: This AI-powered tool helps teachers manage classrooms more efficiently, including real-time engagement tracking, automated attendance, and early warning for disruptions. The goal is to support teachers while ensuring student privacy and fairness.
conceptCard.payer: School District or Educational Institution funding the AI system for classroom management and teacher support.
conceptCard.endUser: Teachers and classroom staff who interact with the AI system daily to monitor and manage students.
conceptCard.servicingParty: EdTech company or IT department responsible for deploying, maintaining, and updating the AI system.
conceptCard.impactedIndividuals: Students whose engagement, attendance, and behavior are monitored by the AI system, and their parents/guardians.
conceptCard.doAct: Automatically record attendance, flag disengaged students, and alert teachers to possible disruptions in real time.
conceptCard.inferReason: Analyze engagement data to infer which students may need additional support or intervention.
conceptCard.data1: Student engagement metrics (e.g., eye contact, participation, device usage).
conceptCard.data2: Attendance records and historical classroom behavior data.
conceptCard.data3: Teacher notes and feedback on student participation and classroom climate.
conceptCard.data4: Demographic information and learning profiles for each student.

values.definition: A transparent AI system helps educators and students understand how decisions are made. Transparency means the system offers insight into why it flagged something or made a recommendation.

tensions.definition: To protect student privacy, developers may limit how much personal data the system collects. While this safeguards confidentiality, it can also reduce the systemâ€™s ability to make accurate or helpful predictions.
